commit_message:
Add support for the openSUSE Leap distributions

Add support for the openSUSE Leap distributions. The security rules
are similar to the RedHat and Ubuntu ones. We also replace
ansible_os_family with ansible_pkg_mgr since the former does not
return consistent results across different SUSE distributions especially
on older Ansible versions.

Change-Id: I20ffe17039bb641aad70d8123f0b7e7417a42cba

mock from sahara.i18n import _ from sahara.plugins.vanilla.hadoop2 import config from sahara.plugins.vanilla.hadoop2 import config_helper as c_helper from sahara.plugins.vanilla.hadoop2 import run_scripts as run from sahara.plugins.vanilla.hadoop2 import scaling from sahara.plugins.vanilla.hadoop2 import utils as pu from sahara.plugins.vanilla import utils as vu from sahara.swift import swift_helper from sahara.tests.unit import base class ScalingTest(base.SaharaTestCase): def setUp(self): super(ScalingTest, self).setUp() self.cluster = mock.Mock() self.instances = mock.Mock() scaling.HADOOP_CONF_DIR = 'hadoop_path' def test_scale_cluster(self): config.configure_instances = mock.Mock() scaling._update_include_files = mock.Mock() run.refresh_hadoop_nodes = mock.Mock() vu.get_resourcemanager = mock.Mock(return_value='1') run.refresh_yarn_nodes = mock.Mock() config.configure_topology_data = mock.Mock() run.start_dn_nm_processes = mock.Mock() swift_helper.install_ssl_certs = mock.Mock() pctx = mock.Mock() scaling.scale_cluster(pctx, self.cluster, self.instances) config.configure_instances.assert_called_once_with(pctx, self.instances) scaling._update_include_files.assert_called_once_with(self.cluster) run.refresh_hadoop_nodes.assert_called_once_with(self.cluster) vu.get_resourcemanager.assert_called_once_with(self.cluster) run.refresh_yarn_nodes.assert_called_once_with(self.cluster) config.configure_topology_data.assert_called_once_with(pctx, self.cluster) run.start_dn_nm_processes.assert_called_once_with(self.instances) swift_helper.install_ssl_certs.assert_called_once_with(self.instances) def test__get_instances_with_service(self): ins_1 = mock.Mock() ins_1.node_group.node_processes = ['abc'] ins_2 = mock.Mock() ins_2.node_group.node_processes = ['bac'] instances = [ins_1, ins_2] service = 'abc' ret = scaling._get_instances_with_service(instances, service) self.assertEqual(ret, [ins_1]) @mock.patch('sahara.utils.cluster.check_cluster_exists') @mock.patch('sahara.utils.cluster_progress_ops.add_provisioning_step') @mock.patch('sahara.plugins.utils.generate_fqdn_host_names') @mock.patch('sahara.plugins.utils.get_instances') def test__update_include_files(self, get_instances, generate_fqdn_host_names, add_provisioning_step, check_cluster_exists): DIR = scaling.HADOOP_CONF_DIR host = '1.2.3.4' ins_1 = mock.Mock() ins_1.id = 'instance_1' ins_2 = mock.Mock() ins_2.id = 'instance_2' ins_3 = mock.Mock() ins_3.id = 'instance_3' ins_4 = mock.Mock() ins_4.id = 'instance_4' dec_instances = [ins_1, ins_2] r = mock.Mock() r.execute_command = mock.Mock() instance = mock.Mock() instance.remote.return_value.__enter__ = mock.Mock(return_value=r) instance.remote.return_value.__exit__ = mock.Mock() get_instances.return_value = [instance] vu.get_datanodes = mock.Mock(return_value=[ins_3]) vu.get_nodemanagers = mock.Mock(return_value=[ins_4]) generate_fqdn_host_names.return_value = host scaling._update_include_files(self.cluster, dec_instances) get_instances.assert_called_once_with(self.cluster) vu.get_datanodes.assert_called_once_with(self.cluster) vu.get_nodemanagers.assert_called_once_with(self.cluster) count = generate_fqdn_host_names.call_count self.assertEqual(count, 2) command_calls = [mock.call( 'sudo su - -c "echo \'%s\' > %s/dn-include" hadoop' % ( host, DIR)), mock.call( 'sudo su - -c "echo \'%s\' > %s/nm-include" hadoop' % ( host, DIR))] r.execute_command.assert_has_calls(command_calls, any_order=True) def test_decommission_nodes(self): data = 'test_data' scaling._get_instances_with_service = mock.Mock(return_value=data) scaling._update_exclude_files = mock.Mock() run.refresh_hadoop_nodes = mock.Mock() vu.get_resourcemanager = mock.Mock(return_value='1') run.refresh_yarn_nodes = mock.Mock() scaling._check_nodemanagers_decommission = mock.Mock() scaling._check_datanodes_decommission = mock.Mock() scaling._update_include_files = mock.Mock() scaling._clear_exclude_files = mock.Mock() config.configure_topology_data = mock.Mock() pctx = mock.Mock() scaling.decommission_nodes(pctx, self.cluster, self.instances) get_instances_count = scaling._get_instances_with_service.call_count self.assertEqual(get_instances_count, 2) scaling._update_exclude_files.assert_called_once_with(self.cluster, self.instances) refresh_count = run.refresh_hadoop_nodes.call_count self.assertEqual(refresh_count, 2) vu.get_resourcemanager.assert_called_once_with(self.cluster) run.refresh_yarn_nodes.assert_called_once_with(self.cluster) check_node = scaling._check_nodemanagers_decommission check_node.assert_called_once_with(self.cluster, data) check_data = scaling._check_datanodes_decommission check_data.assert_called_once_with(self.cluster, data) scaling._update_include_files.assert_called_once_with(self.cluster, self.instances) scaling._clear_exclude_files.assert_called_once_with(self.cluster) config.configure_topology_data.assert_called_once_with(pctx, self.cluster) @mock.patch('sahara.plugins.utils.generate_fqdn_host_names') @mock.patch('sahara.plugins.utils.get_instances') def test__update_exclude_files(self, get_instances, generate_fqdn_host_names): node = mock.Mock() scaling._get_instances_with_service = mock.Mock(return_value=node) host = '1.2.3.4' generate_fqdn_host_names.return_value = host r = mock.Mock() r.execute_command = mock.Mock() instance = mock.Mock() instance.remote.return_value.__enter__ = mock.Mock(return_value=r) instance.remote.return_value.__exit__ = mock.Mock() get_instances.return_value = [instance] scaling._update_exclude_files(self.cluster, self.instances) service_calls = [mock.call(self.instances, 'datanode'), mock.call(self.instances, 'nodemanager')] scaling._get_instances_with_service.assert_has_calls( service_calls, any_order=True) self.assertEqual(generate_fqdn_host_names.call_count, 2) get_instances.assert_called_once_with(self.cluster) DIR = scaling.HADOOP_CONF_DIR command_calls = [mock.call( 'sudo su - -c "echo \'%s\' > %s/dn-exclude" hadoop' % ( host, DIR)), mock.call( 'sudo su - -c "echo \'%s\' > %s/nm-exclude" hadoop' % ( host, DIR))] r.execute_command.assert_has_calls(command_calls, any_order=True) @mock.patch('sahara.plugins.utils.get_instances') def test__clear_exclude_files(self, get_instances): r = mock.Mock() r.execute_command = mock.Mock() instance = mock.Mock() instance.remote.return_value.__enter__ = mock.Mock(return_value=r) instance.remote.return_value.__exit__ = mock.Mock() get_instances.return_value = [instance] scaling._clear_exclude_files(self.cluster) get_instances.assert_called_once_with(self.cluster) DIR = scaling.HADOOP_CONF_DIR calls = [mock.call('sudo su - -c "echo > %s/dn-exclude" hadoop' % DIR), mock.call('sudo su - -c "echo > %s/nm-exclude" hadoop' % DIR)] r.execute_command.assert_has_calls(calls, any_order=True) def test_is_decommissioned(self): def check_func(cluster): statuses = {'status': cluster} return statuses ins = mock.Mock() ins.fqdn.return_value = 'status' instances = [ins] cluster = 'decommissioned' ret = scaling.is_decommissioned(cluster, check_func, instances) self.assertEqual(ret, True) cluster = 'active' ret = scaling.is_decommissioned(cluster, check_func, instances) self.assertEqual(ret, False) @mock.patch('sahara.utils.poll_utils.plugin_option_poll') def test__check__decommission(self, plugin_option_poll): check_func = mock.Mock() option = mock.Mock() is_dec = scaling.is_decommissioned mess = _("Wait for decommissioning") sample_dict = {'cluster': self.cluster, 'check_func': check_func, 'instances': self.instances} scaling._check_decommission(self.cluster, self.instances, check_func, option) plugin_option_poll.assert_called_once_with(self.cluster, is_dec, option, mess, 5, sample_dict) @mock.patch('sahara.utils.cluster.check_cluster_exists') @mock.patch('sahara.utils.cluster_progress_ops.add_provisioning_step') def test__check_nodemanagers_decommission(self, add_provisioning_step, check_cluster_exists): scaling._check_decommission = mock.Mock() timeout = c_helper.NODEMANAGERS_DECOMMISSIONING_TIMEOUT status = pu.get_nodemanagers_status scaling._check_nodemanagers_decommission(self.cluster, self.instances) scaling._check_decommission.assert_called_once_with(self.cluster, self.instances, status, timeout) @mock.patch('sahara.utils.cluster.check_cluster_exists') @mock.patch('sahara.utils.cluster_progress_ops.add_provisioning_step') def test__check_datanodes_decommission(self, add_provisioning_step, check_cluster_exists): scaling._check_decommission = mock.Mock() timeout = c_helper.DATANODES_DECOMMISSIONING_TIMEOUT status = pu.get_datanodes_status scaling._check_datanodes_decommission(self.cluster, self.instances) scaling._check_decommission.assert_called_once_with(self.cluster, self.instances, status, timeout)
